Articles.Content:
What insanity has possessed my KSP to apply all Mirror symmetry against horizontal plane? And how do I switch it off?

No matter how I rotate the central part, root part, or whatever, the game insists on mirroring the current part above or below, not left or right...
I think you may have rotated your root part, or it's just another bug.

I've gotten this weirdness before when I've accidentally managed to mix mirror and radial symmetry in the same craft (it toggles with R I believe). I've never fixed it other than rebuilding nearly every part involved.
